text: Parveen Sultana ( known by her stage name Diti; 31 March 1965 â€“ 20 March 2016) was a Bangladeshi film and television actress. She won the Bangladesh National Film Award for Best Supporting Actress in 1987 for her performance in Shami Stri. She acted in more than 200 films in her career. == Awards== Year Award Category Film Results 1987 National Film Awards Best Actress in a Supporting Role Swami Stree ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1965 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Bangladeshi movie actors Category:Recipients of Bangladesh National Film Awards Category:People from Dhaka Division
title: Parveen Sultana Diti
